books.title: After Dark
books.author: Haruki Murakami
books.description: A surreal, atmospheric novel that explores the interconnected lives of strangers during a single enigmatic night in Tokyo.

books.title: The Day The Sun Died
books.author: Yan Lianke
books.description: The Day The Sun Died by Yan Lianke is a darkly satirical novel about a small village descending into chaos as its residents, caught in a nightmarish state of 'dreamwalking,' blur the lines between reality and dream, exposing the fragility of societal order.

books.title: The Vegetarian
books.author: Han Kang
books.description: The Vegetarian by Han Kang is a haunting novel about a woman's decision to renounce meat and its cascading effects on her family and psyche, exploring themes of desire, control.

reading_list.quote: Dualisme og friheten som en sovende by kan tilby. After Dark utforsker kontrastene i menneskelivet gjennom nattens transformasjon av Tokyo. Natten åpner opp for et annet liv, der mennesker får muligheten til å være noe annet, kanskje noe mer ekte, men kun for en kort stund.
Byen ser alt, men forstår lite - et levende system skapt av oss. Mennesker har gitt liv til abstrakte systemer som økonomi, politikk og teknologi, men vi har også mistet kontroll over dem.
